item.description:
Do you want to know about Vampire Lore?

One of the most recent vampire movies is the Tween
Flick of Twilight.

Do you want your Tween to learn more about their favorite
novel or movie characters?

Event Link

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/calendar/view_entry.php?id=52&date=20090505


A.

http://www.yelp.com/b...

www.yelp.com/biz/milford-public-library-milford-7

B.

Twilight

1)

http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt1099212/

2)

http://www.stepheniem...

www.stepheniemeyer.com/twilight.html

C)

1)

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vampire


2)

http://www.vampires.c...

www.vampires.com/


D)

Vampires of Conn.

1)

http://www.registerci...

www.registercitizen.com/articles/2008/11/02/news/doc490e5cc2edca6475695642.txt

2)

http://www.curbstone....

www.curbstone.org/index.cfm?webpage=109

3)

http://users.net1plus...

users.net1plus.com/vyrdolak/NEFolkbelief.htm

This Group often makes changes to their schedules.
I cannot keep those changes up to date daily.
I will make the required changes when I get to them.
Please monitor the web link for changes.
I send Events to the Message Board (MB).
Normally, I do not delete earlier messages
From the MB because one would expect the most recent
Message would supercede the earlier message of the Event.
I have to delete these earlier messages.


Research Agency has brought some issues to my attention.
My way of handling those issues is to have this memo in all
Research Agency Meet Ups in 2009.
Research Events ARE NOT TOTALLY FREE.
They have raffle and meal tickets that cost money.
Some events have booklets that cost money.
Research Agency and the Vendors sell products that cost money.
Psychics and others give readings that cost money.
You can go on their site of

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org

For more details and some things can be
Purchased on line.

Research Agency asks for a donation for attending some of their events.
(Yea, I know. You can talk to them about the difference between
a donation and charging admission. I am not getting involved.)

Research has brought to my attention that some of my members
Have gone to Research Agency Events.
They told Research Agency that I said
That my members do not have to pay for anything at the
Research Agency Events.
I really do not know what they are talking
About because none of my members have come to me
With this issue.
I would not say this.
item.how_to_find_us: The Research Group are the POC for this event.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: UZ Learns about the Night Creatures
